original_text: But the people did not obey their leaders. They refused to serve the Lord faithfully. Instead, they worshipped false gods. They did not live in the way that their ancestors had lived. Their ancestors had obeyed the Lord's commands, but they refused to obey him.
korean_text: 그들이 그 사사들에게도 순종하지 아니하고 오히려 다른 신들을 따라가 음행하며 그들에게 절하고 여호와의 명령을 순종하던 그들의 조상들이 행하던 길에서 속히 치우쳐 떠나서 그와 같이 행하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: But the people did not obey their leaders
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 백성들은 그들의 지도자들을 순종하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: They refused to serve the Lord faithfully
They did not live in the way
Their ancestors had obeyed the Lord's commands
but they refused to obey him
